# 1 Getting Started

## 1.1 Install and Load R Packages


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
pacman::p_load(tidyverse, tsibble, feasts, fable, seasonal)
```
:::


## 1.2 Import Data


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
ts_data <- read_csv("data/visitor_arrivals_by_air.csv")
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stderr}

```
Rows: 144 Columns: 34
── Column specification ────────────────────────────────────────────────────────
Delimiter: ","
chr  (1): Month-Year
dbl (33): Republic of South Africa, Canada, USA, Bangladesh, Brunei, China, ...

ℹ Use `spec()` to retrieve the full column specification for this data.
ℹ Specify the column types or set `show_col_types = FALSE` to quiet this message.
```


:::
:::


# 2 Time-Series Data Visualization

Overwrite the Month-Year


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
ts_data$`Month-Year` <- dmy(
  ts_data$`Month-Year`
)
```
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
ts_data_ts <- ts(ts_data)
head(ts_data_ts)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}


:::
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
ts_tsibble <- ts_data %>%
  mutate(Month = yearmonth(`Month-Year`)) %>%
  as_tsibble(index = `Month`)

ts_tsibble
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}

```
# A tsibble: 144 x 35 [1M]
   `Month-Year` `Republic of South Africa` Canada   USA Bangladesh Brunei China
   <date>                            <dbl>  <dbl> <dbl>      <dbl>  <dbl> <dbl>
 1 2008-01-01                         3680   6972 31155       6786   3729 79599
 2 2008-02-01                         1662   6056 27738       6314   3070 82074
 3 2008-03-01                         3394   6220 31349       7502   4805 72546
 4 2008-04-01                         3337   4764 26376       7333   3096 76112
 5 2008-05-01                         2089   4460 26788       7988   3586 64808
 6 2008-06-01                         2515   3888 29725       8301   5284 55238
 7 2008-07-01                         2919   5313 33183       9004   4070 80747
 8 2008-08-01                         2471   4519 27427       7913   4183 66625

10 2008-10-01                         3023   4756 25112       7527   2983 54423
# ℹ 134 more rows

#   Indonesia <dbl>, Japan <dbl>, `South Korea` <dbl>, Kuwait <dbl>,

#   Finland <dbl>, France <dbl>, Germany <dbl>, Italy <dbl>, …
```


:::
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
ts_longer <- ts_data %>%
  pivot_longer(cols = c(2:34),
               names_to = "Country",
               values_to = "Arrivals")
```
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
ts_longer %>%
  filter(Country == "Vietnam") %>%
  ggplot(aes(x = `Month-Year`, 
             y = Arrivals))+
  geom_line(size = 0.5)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stderr}

```
Warning: Using `size` aesthetic for lines was deprecated in ggplot2 3.4.0.
ℹ Please use `linewidth` instead.
```


:::

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](In-class_Ex07_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-7-1.png){width=672}
:::
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
ggplot(data = ts_longer, 
       aes(x = `Month-Year`, 
           y = Arrivals,
           color = Country))+
  geom_line(size = 0.5) +
  theme(legend.position = "bottom", 
        legend.box.spacing = unit(0.5, "cm"))
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](In-class_Ex07_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-8-1.png){width=960}
:::
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
ggplot(data = ts_longer, 
       aes(x = `Month-Year`, 
           y = Arrivals))+
  geom_line(size = 0.5) +
  facet_wrap(~ Country,
             ncol = 3,
             scales = "free_y") +
  theme_bw()
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](In-class_Ex07_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-9-1.png){width=672}
:::
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
tsibble_longer <- ts_tsibble %>%
  pivot_longer(cols = c(2:34),
               names_to = "Country",
               values_to = "Arrivals")
```
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
tsibble_longer %>%
  filter(Country == "Italy" |
         Country == "Vietnam" |
         Country == "United Kingdom" |
         Country == "Germany") %>% 
  gg_season(Arrivals)
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](In-class_Ex07_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-11-1.png){width=672}
:::
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
tsibble_longer %>%
  filter(Country == "Vietnam" |
         Country == "Italy") %>% 
  gg_subseries(Arrivals)
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](In-class_Ex07_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-12-1.png){width=672}
:::
:::


## 2.1 ACF Plot


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
tsibble_longer %>%
  filter(`Country` == "Vietnam") %>%
  ACF(Arrivals) %>% 
  autoplot()
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](In-class_Ex07_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-13-1.png){width=672}
:::
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
tsibble_longer %>%
  filter(`Country` == "Vietnam") %>%
  PACF(Arrivals) %>% 
  autoplot()
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](In-class_Ex07_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-14-1.png){width=672}
:::
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
tsibble_longer %>%
  filter(`Country` == "Vietnam" |
         `Country` == "Italy" |
         `Country` == "United Kingdom" |
         `Country` == "China") %>%
  ACF(Arrivals) %>%
  autoplot()
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](In-class_Ex07_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-15-1.png){width=672}
:::
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
tsibble_longer %>%
  filter(`Country` == "Vietnam" |
         `Country` == "Italy" |
         `Country` == "United Kingdom" |
         `Country` == "China") %>%
  PACF(Arrivals) %>%
  autoplot()
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](In-class_Ex07_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-16-1.png){width=672}
:::
:::


## 2.2 STL


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
tsibble_longer %>%
  filter(`Country` == "Vietnam") %>%
  model(stl = STL(Arrivals)) %>%
  components() %>%
  autoplot()
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](In-class_Ex07_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-17-1.png){width=672}
:::
:::


## 2.3 Visualising Autocorrelation: feasts method


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
vietnam_ts <- tsibble_longer %>%
  filter(Country == "Vietnam") %>% 
  mutate(Type = if_else(
    `Month-Year` >= "2019-01-01", 
    "Hold-out", "Training"))
```
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
vietnam_train <- vietnam_ts %>%
  filter(`Month-Year` < "2019-01-01")
```
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
tsibble_longer %>%
  filter(`Country` == "Vietnam") %>%
  ACF(Arrivals) %>% 
  autoplot()
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](In-class_Ex07_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-20-1.png){width=672}
:::
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
tsibble_longer %>%
  filter(`Country` == "United Kingdom") %>%
  ACF(Arrivals) %>% 
  autoplot()
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](In-class_Ex07_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-21-1.png){width=672}
:::
:::


## 2.4 Differencing: fable methods

### 2.4.1 Trend Differencing


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
tsibble_longer %>%
  filter(Country == "Vietnam") %>%
  gg_tsdisplay(difference(
    Arrivals,
    lag = 1), 
    plot_type='partial')
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stderr}

```
Warning: Removed 1 row containing missing values or values outside the scale range
(`geom_line()`).
```


:::

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stderr}

```
Warning: Removed 1 row containing missing values or values outside the scale range
(`geom_point()`).
```


:::

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](In-class_Ex07_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-22-1.png){width=672}
:::
:::


### 2.4.2 Seasonal Differencing


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
tsibble_longer %>%
  filter(Country == "Vietnam") %>%
  gg_tsdisplay(difference(
    Arrivals,
    difference = 12), 
    plot_type='partial')
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stderr}

```
Warning: Removed 12 rows containing missing values or values outside the scale range
(`geom_line()`).
```


:::

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stderr}

```
Warning: Removed 12 rows containing missing values or values outside the scale range
(`geom_point()`).
```


:::

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](In-class_Ex07_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-23-1.png){width=672}
:::
:::


## 2.5 Fitting ARIMA Models: fable methods


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
fit_autoARIMA <- vietnam_train %>%
  model(ARIMA(Arrivals))
report(fit_autoARIMA)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}

```
Series: Arrivals 
Model: ARIMA(2,0,0)(2,1,0)[12] w/ drift 

Coefficients:
         ar1     ar2     sar1     sar2   constant
      0.4748  0.1892  -0.5723  -0.1578  1443.2068
s.e.  0.0924  0.0903   0.0989   0.1032   188.9468

sigma^2 estimated as 4173906:  log likelihood=-1084.6
AIC=2181.19   AICc=2181.94   BIC=2197.92
```


:::
:::
